channel.title: Showcase
channel.description: Exhibit your best images and content with a theme that displays them with clean, bright style.

wp:category.wp:category_description: This is a sample description for this category. You can enable it from the Edit Category screen in your WordPress Dashboard.

wp:termmeta.wp:meta_value: This is a sample description for this category. You can enable it from the Edit Category screen in your WordPress Dashboard.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: * NOTE this contact form won't actually contact anyone.
* NOTE this contact form won't actually contact anyone.

Dear JT,
I love the simple elegance of Showcase Pro. I think it looks great.
One quick question though I hope this is the right place to ask:
I would like to use a drawing for my front page hero image and for that I would like to set the opacity to zero so that there is no color overlay. Could you tell me how to style the css for that?
Just to be clear: I do like the opacity feature and I would like to keep it on other pages and posts, just not on the front page.
This is my site: http://nl-ganz-schnell.de/
Thanks for your time, it appreciate it very much.
Best, Alexandra

Hi there, I'm using Showcase for a Equine Joint Supplement site that needs to use WooCommerce to sell their products. I've also installed and activated the Genesis Connect for WooCommerce which allows for using Genesis with WooCommerce. I've included this line in the functions.php file to make it work correctly: add_theme_support( 'genesis-connect-woocommerce' ); However, when the plug-in is activated, the regular pages don't display any content. The sidebars are shown, but no content on the page itself, even though content exists. As soon as I deactivate the plugin, the content re-appears. Do you have any insight as to why this happens? I'm using this plugin with other Genesis themes and I don't have this problem. Thanks in advance!

I am working with the showcase pro theme. I wonder if it is possible to get different images in the div below the header, like the frontpage. Hope to hear from you,
kind regards, Georgette

Hello, I have the showcase pro theme and I would like to have on single image on my home page without the blue. At the moment I have a faint image and the blue covering the image on my home page. How can this be changed? Many thanks for your help. Simona

Hello I have the showcase theme and would like to ask how I can remove the blue on the homepage image and only see the image without the blue. I tried to do various things with the colors but it seems even if I put it on trasparent or white I do not have a 100% color image. Can you please let me know as soon as possible. Many thanks, Simona

I've been doing pool and landscape design. I'm looking to design my first website and was interested in knowing what format this fits. I'm also looking to double up on the design and make sure I can utilize it for a secondary website that I'm trying to design. The second one is going to be a full online store that crowdfunds products that I'm trying to buy en masse from China. I want to know which one I should go with.
Thanks,
Hadi

Hello!
I have just purchased your showcase pro theme and I'm having trouble figuring out the heroheader. I would like to insert some text, but something similar to what is on your static front page (the large white bolded text). Unfortunately, I have no idea how to do this. The arbitrary text widget does not seem to do this.
Any help would be greatly appreciated! Edward Thompson

Hi,
I'm having trouble setting up this theme similar to what is seen on the Live Demo.
1. The Hero picture will not show up. 2. I don't know how to set up the homepage like your Live Demo page.
Please help?

Hallo!
I purchased your Maker Pro Theme, but I have some problems with some things. 1. I cant get the same font size as you have here "A Genesis child theme created with an intense focus on readability and usability." right after the first headline in widget 1. It seems to be H2, but smaller. 2. How can I insert the buttons? 3. Widget 3 does not give me the two-column lookout.
Helina

Hi I am interested in redeveloping my website www.cmgtalent.com I am looking for a Word Press Multi Site that I can convert my content and database into. I'm wondering if your theme would be appropriate. Thoughts...?

Hi,
How can I change the block colour on a default page to an image of my choice.
Many thanks, Katya

Hello!
I am wondering, what is the best way to use video (mp4) in place of the featured image on pages?
Hi, how do I get the widget thirds option like you have on Showcase?

item.title: Typography
item.dc:creator: jtgrauke
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the typography page for the Showcase Pro theme. Were glad you are interested in using this and want to show you how elements look.

Care to see what blockquotes looks like?
This is an example of a WordPress post, you could edit this to put information about your site so readers know where you are coming from. You can create as many posts as you like in order to share with your readers what is on your mind.
Perhaps youd like to see what an unordered list looks like?
  • Unordered list item #1
  • Unordered list item #2
  • Unordered list item #3
Or youd prefer to see what an ordered list looks like?
  1. Ordered list item #1
  2. Ordered list item #2
  3. Ordered list item #3
Care to see what the headings look like?

Headline 1

Headline 2

Headline 3

Headline 4

Headline 5
Headline 6
Check out the button styles

Primary Button Light Button

Small Primary Button Small Light Button

Arrow Left Arrow Right
